events.message: The insured has reported a collision involving their car on the highway resulting in significant front-end damage.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords such as car, collision, and damage identified in the report.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the case promptly to ensure timely assistance to the claimant.
Acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the insured with details on the next steps and required documentation.
Request for police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates was sent to the claimant for processing.
The insured submitted all the requested documents including detailed photos and the official police accident report.
Investigation into the accident circumstances and damage severity began based on the submitted report and evidence.
Investigation confirmed the claimant was not at fault and the damage assessment aligns with the reported collision.
A settlement offer was proposed to the insured covering repair costs and vehicle rental expenses during the repair period.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the handling and clarity of the proposed settlement and overall support.
Claim was officially approved by the underwriting team following the successful investigation and validated documents.
Payment was made to the repair shop and to the insured for rental coverage as per the approved settlement terms.
The claim file was closed following full payment issuance and confirmation of satisfaction from the claimant.
